content: JIRA was down this morning and required a restart. I'm working with Atlassian having restarted the service to determine root cause analysis
we are seeing failure on our integrity checker. I have opened a case with Atlassian.
I'm running individual integrity checks. Workflow Integrity may be where the issue i
rebuilding indexes with a lock, uptime robot has reported jira is down due to slow response
but now it passed after the integrity fix
and uptimerobot is reporting that jira.hl7.org is up
I've gotten responses that the Integrity check was failing due to a null value in some workflows. I was able to use the intergrity checker to fix the null values. This is a common occurrence
I have added the integrity checker to our daily routine. This was being done once a week, but because of the error we will increase our reviews.
